definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
lit. to mistake good intentions for a donkey's liver and lungs (idiom)/fig. to mistake good intentions for ill intent
pinyin: hao3 xin1 dao4 zuo4 le5 lu:2 gan1 fei1

definition: to demand the highest standards of sb (or oneself) (idiom)/to strive to achieve the best possible results/to be a perfectionist
see 黃鼠狼給雞拜年|黄鼠狼给鸡拜年[huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2]
pinyin: huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2 , mei2 an1 hao3 xin1
containing_words.word: 黄鼠狼给鸡拜年，没安好心

sentences.english: Why she’s a spicy dish: Shilpa has the best of intentions but trouble always seems to find her.
sentences.chinese: 希尔帕虽是一片好心，但麻烦总是找上她。

sentences.english: But Mr. Lea's being good enough to let them keep dragging on around here.
sentences.chinese: 但是李老爷让他们在这里苟延残喘已经够好心了。

sentences.english: Then he got a free ride from a warm-hearted Mexican.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他搭了一位好心的墨西哥人的顺风车。

sentences.english: The children, like their parents, are very kind-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子像他们的父母一样都那么好心肠。

sentences.english: He failed not withstanding his good intentions.
Thanks for your kindness, deity Moon, the joy belongs to the others!
sentences.chinese: 月儿好心今谢过，且将厚意属别人。

sentences.english: Would you kindly tell me the meaning of the poem called 'Jabberwocky'?
sentences.chinese: 你可不可以好心地告诉我那首叫‘废话’的诗的意思？

sentences.english: Liang Jingru is a plump, kind-hearted singer.
sentences.chinese: 梁静茹是一个胖胖的好心的歌手。

sentences.english: He owes his life to a kindhearted man.
sentences.chinese: 多亏一位好心人他才活了下来。

sentences.english: This kind gentleman found a wallet.
sentences.chinese: 这位好心的先生拣到了一个钱包。

sentences.english: Say opportunely opportunely , she is orphan, be adopted by person of a good intention.
sentences.chinese: 巧巧说，她是孤儿，被一个好心人收养。

sentences.english: If there is goodness in your heart, it will come to your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 好舌头不出恶声，好心肠不想恶事。

sentences.english: The snake was saved by the old kind hearted man.
sentences.chinese: 这位好心肠的老人救起了这条蛇。

sentences.english: He's a real softie at heart .
Mr. Wah. I am so kind to show you the painting.
sentences.chinese: 华太师，我好心拿幅画给你欣赏。

definition: to offer shelter/to have sb in one's care
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to meet with misfortune/to fall into dire straits
lit. the exertion of lifting one's hand (idiom)/fig. a very slight effort
to request sb to do sth/please!
